programs.name: Playing Out

programs.name: Play Streets Program
programs.outcome: NYC was among first US cities to designate play streets; current program allows temporary closures during summer months

programs.name: Woonerven (Living Streets)
programs.outcome: Permanent design concept where pedestrians and play have priority over vehicles; influenced global shared space movement
